::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus moves down the narrow hall, with some difficulty. He takes position about half way behind the exit where Team 1 is. Rodimus takes a knee and takes aim with his blaster rifle. He was prepared to cover Team 1.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  "Alright, mission time will start..... now!" said Perseus into the radio. 

Immediately afterward he reached down and typed on the security panel on the door.  The narrow door quickly opened, revealing a narrow hallway which was lined with bright bluish-white colored forcefields about every 20 meters. 

Lord Perseus made a gesture instructing everyone to follow and he began to run down the hallway.  The troopers and Ravenchief followed closely after him, Guardia waited for Rodimus.

The tunnel, which was more like a small alley, was very narrow; quite possibly too narrow for larger bots.  It was not very well lit, most of the light in the tunnel was provided by the light which was filtering down from the surface through the pipes and wires which ran under city.  However the light was minimal because the openings which were covered by thick grates were well over two stories above the the walkway. 

As Perseus moved within range of each forcefield, the forcefield deactivated, allowing him and the group to pass through.

OOC:  Please have your characters move into the tunnel so the doors can close.

 
On 3/19/07, Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                                    Doc: Affirmative!
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
 >
 > Perseus watched as his two backup troopers arrived, Ravenchief and
 > Guardia were standing ready.
 > 
 > "Salveo here,  I'm ready," he said through the radio.  "I've geared up
 > and I'm ready to complete the lockdown on your signal."
 > 
 > "Understood, do a final scan and prepare to comense operation."
 > responded Perseus.
 > 
 > Lord Perseus noticed that Doc and Rodimus were already there waiting.
 > He nodded in acknowledgment.
 > 
 > "Is everybody ready?" he asked.
 > 

 > On 3/18/07, Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
 > > OOC: I think Doc and Rodimus responded. Not sure about the rest... Oh,
 > > doesn't matter.
 > >
 > > BIC:
 > >
 > > Doc: Doc in position and waiting orders.
 > >
 > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
 > > >
 > > > OOC: Anyone?
 > > >
 > > > On 3/15/07, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
 > > > >
 > > > > After they had geared up, Lord Perseus, Guardia, and Ravenchief
 > > > > proceded to the lower exit.  The base was built with three
 levels in a
 > > > > stepped design.  The lower entance logically was on the lowest
 level.
 > > > >
 > > > > The lower exit was a relatively small door located next to the
 holding
 > > > > cells at the bottom of the stairs.   Normally this area wouls
 be open
 > > > > to the cells and an large unused room but the partition doors
 were now
 > > > > down, blocking all access to the area.
 > > > >
 > > > > "Roll call!  Who's here!" said Perseus into his radio,
 speaking loud
 > > > > enough to be heard by those standing nearby.
 > > > >
 > > > > On 3/13/07, Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > > > > > Doc: Salveo, link up to my comm system. Everyone, open your comm
 > > links
 > > > > > on my frequency so everything will be relayed to everyone in
 > > real time.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > He took out a rifle from his back and extended it to twice its
 > > length.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > Doc: It's time to show that brute who's in charge here!
 > > > > >
 > > > > > He went to team 2's rendez-vous point.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
 > > > > > >
 > > > > > > "All right, if there are no no more questions, let's move out.
 > >  Team
 > > > > > > three, go to your positions, teams one and two, meet me down
 > > at the
 > > > > > > exit
 > > > > > > tunnel entrance in 10 cycles." he paused a minute then walked
 > > out the
 > > > > > > door toward the armory.
 > > > > > >
 > > > > > > Salveo began preparing the security systems.  "If  you need
 > > help with
 > > > > > > your radio, I can help.  Otherwise, go and gear up."
 > > > > > >
 > > > > > > Guardia and Ravenchief left the room, following Perseus.
 > > > > > >
 > > > > > > On 3/12/07, Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > > > > > > > Doc: Acknowledged. If you want my opinion, though, I'd
 think we
 > > > > better
 > > > > > > > get moving.
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > ***
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > Still reflecting, Dinobot was considering what to do. Of
 > > course, he
 > > > > > > > could remain true to his word... And yet, so much was at
 > > stake. He
 > > > > > > > remembered Optimus Primal. If those Maximals were anything
 > > like him,
 > > > > > > > they would try to parley first. He then thought of
 > > Depthcharge and
 > > > > > > > Rattrap. What to expect? Well, the first thing was
 surely not to
 > > > > scare
 > > > > > > > them... and seeing how people had fled when the alarm
 broke out,
 > > > > that
 > > > > > > > was a bad start.
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
  > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > OOC: Sorry, I made that last post without reading the
 > > following
 > > > > > three
 > > > > > > > > responses.  I think it still fits.
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > "Well, as I said, the citizens have been evacuated;
 however
 > > > > > other than
 > > > > > > > > locking down the base, the tower, and the airport, we
 > > really don't
 > > > > > > > have any
 > > > > > > > > means to contain him.  Besides that, we have no place to
 > > put the
 > > > > bot
 > > > > > > > if we
 > > > > > > > > do end up capturing it.  I think diplomacy or letting
 the Pred
 > > > > > > > escape would
 > > > > > > > > probably be our best options." he said.  "I would move
 > > that minion
 > > > > > > > back to
 > > > > > > > > the CR or make a temporary holding facility, but I've
 > > learned from
 > > > > > > > > experience that hastily built jails are nothing but
 trouble."
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > He pushed a button on the holo table and brought up an
 > > overhead
 > > > > > map with
 > > > > > > > > lists of the teams floating above.
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > Team One
 > > > > > > > > Lord Perseus
 > > > > > > > > Ravenchief
 > > > > > > > > 2 Troopers
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > Team Two
 > > > > > > > > Rodimus
 > > > > > > > > Guardia
 > > > > > > > > Doc (independent)
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > Team Three
 > > > > > > > > Salveo
 > > > > > > > > Kenzo
 > > > > > > > > Nightlight
 > > > > > > > > 4 Troopers
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > "I can get you access to the tower if you want to locate
 > > > > there.  You
 > > > > > > > should
 > > > > > > > > be able to see everything from there and I think your
 > > presence may
 > > > > > > > give the
 > > > > > > > > scientists there a feeling of security.  I want all
 > > support to be
 > > > > > > > directed
 > > > > > > > > by Rodimus, but avoid violence if at all possible."
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > "The base team will be supported by our loyal troopers,
 > > however
 > > > > you
 > > > > > > > may be
 > > > > > > > > called upon to assist if for some reason the base
 comes under
 > > > > fire."
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > "Teams 1 and 2 will leave via the tunnel down by the
 detention
 > > > > > facility,
 > > > > > > > > that way no one will see us leave the base and we can
 > > leave the
 > > > > > > > shields up.
 > > > > > > > > We need to make sure no one sees us leave.
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > My team will proceed to the waterfront, and team 2 will
 > > position
 > > > > > > > themselves
 > > > > > > > > so that they can cover us."
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > "When everyone is in position, I will attempt to make
 > > contact with
 > > > > > > > the bot.
 > > > > > > > > If he chooses violence, he will need to get through
 all of us
 > > > > before
 > > > > > > > he gets
 > > > > > > > > up the ramp into the city."
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > "And we all know the mission goals, we can change the
 > > strategy as
 > > > > > > > conditions
 > > > > > > > > change.  Any questions?"
 > > > > > > > >

 > > > > > rest.

 Salveo.

 we'll have

 > > > > > > > > > > rest. But

 > > time to
 > > > > rest
 > > > > > > > > > up." said
